Package rummy

Class RummyGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Game
      • rummy.RummyGame
  • public final class RummyGame
extends Game
    Implementation of the rummy game. This class contains game related methods.

      • getGameState

        protected GameState getGameState​(GamePlayer p,
                                 int stateType)
        Description copied from class: Game
        Gets information about the state of the game. Only gives information if the given player is allowed to know that information. Subclasses should override this method to specialize its behavior based on the particular game that is being played. (The handling of the -1 stateType is done in the public getState method.)
        Specified by:
        getGameState in class Game
        Parameters:
        p - the player asking the question
        stateType - a game-dependent encoding, specifying the particular type of information the player wants
        Returns:
        an object that contains the information that the caller requested

      • makeMove

        protected boolean makeMove​(GamePlayer thePlayer,
                           GameMoveAction move)
        Requests that a move be made on behalf of a player. Typically, the player that wants to make the move creates a MoveAction object that encodes the move he wants to make, and then calls this method, passing itself as the player object. As long as the player does not allow any other player to know who it is (which is typical), no other player can make a move on this player's behalf because it does not have a reference to that player, and therefore cannot pass it as a parameter. This method should check that the given player is allowed to make the specified move before actually performing the move.
        Specified by:
        makeMove in class Game
        Parameters:
        thePlayer - The player wishing to make the move.
        move - The move object that encodes the requested move
        Returns:
        true if the move was successfully made; false if it's an illegal move.

      • currentIsHuman

        public boolean currentIsHuman()
        Method used by GUI to check which human player hand to display.
        Returns:
        Boolean indicating if current player is a human

      • validateMeld

        public boolean validateMeld​(java.util.Vector<Card> meld)
        Method to validate the meld before it can be played.
        Parameters:
        meld -
        Returns:
        true if meld valid or false if meld is invalid
